message: Let's be realistic, Bob. Take it or leave it.
I understand you want a larger share, Alice, but my offer is more than fair considering the circumstances. Let's settle this now before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Bob, time is running out. This is my final offer. Don't let inflation shrink your share even more.
Alice, this is my final offer.  You're cutting it close with inflation. Accept this deal and we both walk away with something substantial.
